remarks: Convert a quantification over a triple to a conjunction.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Apr-2019.)
statement:
ralprd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralprd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
raltpd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = C ) -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
ralprd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ralprd.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
raltpd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
raltpd $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. { A , B , C } ps <-> ( ch /\ th /\ ta ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
